ehotel.inter
Interface AMDLiveTV

public interface AMDLiveTV

AMDLiveTV interface supply functions to manipulate database in LiveTV-Admin side.

Since:
SDK1.6
Version:
ehotel2.0
Author:
hoavk@elcom.com.vn

Method Detail

addSubject

int addSubject(java.lang.String subjName,
               int parentId)
create a new channel Subject in service side

Parameters:
subjName - new subject name to add to the system
parentId - the level of subject in tree
Returns:
return sequence value which save in database.if the subject is completely added.-1 otherwise.

removeSubject

boolean removeSubject(int subjId)
remove a subject

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject to remove
Returns:
true if the subject is completely removed. false otherwise.

editSubject

int editSubject(int subjId,
                java.lang.String newName,
                int langId)
update information of subject

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject to update info.
newName - A new desired name of subject.
langId - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
Returns:
return 1 if the subject is completely updated. -1 is duplicate name otherwise.

getSubjectInfo

Subject getSubjectInfo(int subjId,
                       int langid)
get detail information of a subject

Parameters:
subjId - A sequence of the desired subject to get info
langid - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
Returns:
Subject. The object contain entire information (such as id,name,urlImage). May be is null.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException , java.lang.NullPointerException

getChannelInfo

                      int langId)
get detail information of a channel

Parameters:
channelId - A sequence of the desired channel(channelId) to get info
langId - Data is present on screen by language ( 1=VN,2=EN)
Returns:
return the object which contain entire channel information (such as channelid ,channelname,channelcode,servicename,physical_address). Should not be null
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException, java.lang.NullPointerException

remove channel from a subject.

Parameters:

Returns:
